name: Goal.io!
description:
There has never been a brawl soccer like this!
Is this a soccer game, or a brawl!?
The reason I was able to become a soccer god?
10,000 balls shot during practice... that’s how.

■A real-time 2 vs 2 brawl soccer game with players all around the world!
■You didn’t just score a goal and taunt the opponents... did you?
■Feel the thrill of a shot at the tip of your fingers!

Just 10 minutes!
The Gms are so eager to give away everything!! Take it all!
Easy peasy!! Goal!!! Get hooked!

Home page
https://www.facebook.com/daerisoft

https://twitter.com/daerisoft

■■■■■ Game Features ■■■■■

.io-style sports arcade game
A team battle with a team member!
What weapons do you receive on the field? lol
Use various items and skills
Unique and trendy characters!

■■■■■ Game Description ■■■■■

Score more goals than your opponent within 4 minutes
Control 2 players at a 1vs1 PVP game
Smack, throw, and fly! Take control of the ball and score goals
Win to become a stronger team!

At "Goal.io," a game created with the users,
new challenges await for you.
Win a matches against players from around the world!
